description: In a prehistoric cave setting, two figures huddle by a fire, one consuming a large bone. An unusually tall stick supports a perceptive bird perched nearby, observing the scene. This placement creates an absurd juxtaposition between early human activity and the bird's seemingly intelligent presence. The bird's potential for mimicry ironically contrasts with the basic sounds of the human characters. The surreal height of the bird's perch adds to the overall sense of oddity.
caption: "Grunt, snort ... grunt grunt, snort ..."
